en: The politician attempted a difficult task.
zh: 这位政治家试图完成一项艰巨的任务。

en: I wonder when the Civil War started.
zh: 我想知道内战是什么时候开始的。

en: In the Southern region, sales were up 47 percent.
zh: 在南部地区，销售额增长了47%。

en: Traveling to the southern states during the winter will be costlier than it is now.
zh: 冬天去南部各州旅行将比现在更贵。

en: A diametrically opposed kinship pattern is to be observed among certain South Sea Island communities.
zh: 在某些南海岛屿社区中，可以观察到截然相反的亲属关系模式。

en: The Southern Cross is not to be seen in Japan.
zh: 在日本看不到南十字星。

en: The clouds are coming from the south.
zh: 云是从南方来的。

en: Where is the south terminal?
zh: 南航站楼在哪里？

en: Spanish is spoken in most countries of South America.
zh: 在南美洲的大多数国家都说西班牙语。

en: The Zulu tribe in South Africa has its own language.
zh: 南非的祖鲁部落有自己的语言。

en: There are people called Incas in South America.
zh: 在南美洲有被称为印加人的人。

en: Going back to South Africa had stirred up some painful memories for him.
zh: 回到南非勾起了一些痛苦的回忆。

en: Don't leave the riddle.
zh: 不要离开这个谜语。

en: Please review the contents and provide any appropriate feedback.
zh: 请审查内容并提供任何适当的反馈。

en: How would you like these items?
zh: 这些东西您想要怎么处理？

en: An inner defect never fails to express itself outwardly.
zh: 内在的缺陷总会通过外在表现出来。

en: Every cock crows on his own dunghill.
zh: 每只公鸡都在自己的粪堆上啼叫。（意指在自己的地盘上称王称霸）

en: The inside defects never fail to express themselves outwardly.
zh: 内在的缺陷总会通过外在表现出来。

en: Strife is the rock on which the party split.
zh: 内讧是导致该党分裂的根源。

en: A house divided against itself can't stand.
zh: 家不和，则不兴。

en: I'd like a coat with the wooly side in, please.
zh: 我想要一件羊毛面朝里的外套，谢谢。

en: Extension 45, please.
zh: 请转45号分机。

en: I'll speak to anyone at extension 214.
zh: 我要和214号分机的任何人通话。

en: While the civil war went on, the country was in a state of anarchy.
zh: 内战期间，国家处于无政府状态。

en: If it had not been for civil war, they would be wealthy now.
zh: 如果不是因为内战，他们现在应该很富有了。

en: Between you and me, he was dismissed for bribery.
zh: 你知我知，他是因为受贿被解雇的。

en: Between you and me, I'm going to quit my present job soon.
zh: 你知我知，我很快就要辞掉现在的工作了。

en: Just between you and me, he is a liar.
zh: 你知我知，他是个骗子。

en: I'll tell you only if you promise to keep it to yourself.
zh: 我只会告诉你，如果你保证保密。

en: Between us, he is a little foolish.
zh: 你我之间，他有点傻。

en: Between us, she was ill.
zh: 你我之间，她生病了。

en: Between you and me, John's idea doesn't appeal to me very much.
zh: 你知我知，约翰的想法对我没什么吸引力。

en: I'm afraid I have internal bleeding.
zh: 恐怕我内出血了。

en: I've always loved the freedom that comes from being introverted.
zh: 我一直很喜欢内向带来的自由。

en: I paid him 20000 yen on account.
zh: 我付给他两万日元作为定金。

en: The shy girl kept her idea to herself.
zh: 那个害羞的女孩对自己的想法闭口不谈。

en: The shy boy blushed at her compliment.
zh: 那个害羞的男孩因为她的赞美而脸红了。

en: Down with the Cabinet!
zh: 打倒内阁！

en: They say that the cabinet will fall.
zh: 他们说内阁要倒台了。

en: They say the Cabinet will resign.
zh: 他们说内阁要辞职了。

en: The Cabinet is meeting today to discuss the crisis.
zh: 内阁今天开会讨论危机。

en: Physicians are usually distinguished from surgeons.
zh: 内科医生通常与外科医生区分开来。

en: Where is the Internal Medicine Department?
zh: 内科在哪里？

en: Rejecting the urging of his physician father to study medicine, Hawking chose instead to concentrate on mathematics and physics.
zh: 霍金拒绝了他当医生的父亲让他学医的劝告，而是选择专注于数学和物理。

en: I had my wallet stolen from my inner pocket.
zh: 我的钱包被人从内兜里偷走了。

en: Our dog will bite strangers.
zh: 我们的狗会咬陌生人。

en: Nara is famous for Daibutsu.
zh: 奈良以大佛而闻名。

en: Nara is an old city worth visiting at least once in your life.
zh: 奈良是一座古老的城市，值得一生至少去一次。

en: Nara is a city which I like very much.
zh: 奈良是一座我非常喜欢的城市。

en: Nara is a city that I like very much.
zh: 奈良是一座我非常喜欢的城市。

en: Nara is as old as Kyoto.
zh: 奈良和京都一样古老。

en: Nara is a very old city.
zh: 奈良是一座非常古老的城市。

en: Nara is rich in National Treasures and Important Cultural Assets.
zh: 奈良拥有丰富的国宝和重要文化遗产。

en: I feel there is just no way out.
zh: 我觉得我走投无路了。

en: It was cloudy, with occasional rain.
zh: 阴天，偶尔下雨。

en: It's a cloudy day.
zh: 今天是个阴天。

en: I think it's clouding up.
zh: 我觉得天要阴了。

en: It's cloudy.
zh: 阴天。

en: It's getting cloudy.
zh: 天越来越阴了。

en: As it was cloudy, we could not enjoy the view.
zh: 因为是阴天，我们没能欣赏到风景。

en: Cloudy days, they stopped on their way and could not return home.
zh: 阴天，他们停在路上，回不了家了。

en: Pork doesn't agree with me.
zh: 我吃猪肉不舒服。

en: The pig is growing fat.
zh: 猪长得很肥。

en: Do not cast pearls before swine.
zh: 不要对牛弹琴。

en: Don't cast pearls before swine.
zh: 不要对牛弹琴。

en: I know how piggy feels, He starves without missing a meal.
zh: 我了解猪的感受，它虽然不缺食物，却依然感到饥饿。

en: This is like casting pearls before swine.
zh: 这简直是对牛弹琴。

en: Cast not pearls before swine.
zh: 不要把珍珠丢在猪面前。

en: I was robbed of my rightful share.
zh: 我被剥夺了我应得的份额。

en: Black hens lay white eggs.
zh: 黑母鸡下白蛋。

en: Suddenly, a good idea occurred to me.
zh: 突然，我想到一个好主意。

en: The ghost vanished suddenly.
zh: 鬼魂突然消失了。

en: All of a sudden, I saw a hare running across the field.
zh: 突然，我看见一只野兔跑过田野。

en: All of a sudden, I saw a rabbit running across the field.
zh: 突然，我看见一只兔子跑过田野。

en: Suddenly, all the lights went out.
zh: 突然，所有的灯都熄灭了。

en: All of a sudden, all the lights went out.
zh: 突然，所有的灯都熄灭了。

en: Suddenly, 100 workers were laid off.
zh: 突然，100名工人被解雇了。

en: All at once, I heard a scream.
zh: 突然，我听到一声尖叫。

en: All at once she began to shout in a shrill voice.
zh: 她突然开始用尖锐的声音喊叫。

en: Suddenly, her face was pale.
zh: 突然，她的脸色苍白。

en: Suddenly, they stopped talking.
zh: 突然，他们停止了说话。

en: All at once they began to laugh.
zh: 他们突然一起笑了起来。

en: Suddenly, he accelerated the car.
zh: 突然，他加速了汽车。

en: He died suddenly.
zh: 他突然去世了。

en: His conscience suddenly awoke in him.
zh: 他的良心突然觉醒了。

en: Suddenly, he fell down on his back.
zh: 突然，他仰面摔倒了。

en: All at once, he spoke out.
zh: 他突然一下子说了出来。

en: All at once there was an explosion.
zh: 突然发生了一起爆炸。

en: All of a sudden, the enemy bombs came down on us like rain.
zh: 突然，敌人的炸弹像雨点般落下来。

en: Suddenly, the captain left the ship.
zh: 突然，船长离开了船。

en: All at once the ship left the pier.
zh: 突然，船离开了码头。

en: A man suddenly appeared in the doorway.
zh: 突然，一个人出现在门口。

en: Suddenly the little black rabbit sat down, and looked very sad.
zh: 突然，小黑兔坐了下来，看起来非常难过。

en: Suddenly, a young woman stood up.
zh: 突然，一位年轻女子站了起来。

en: Suddenly I hit on a happy idea.
zh: 突然，我想到一个好主意。

en: All of a sudden, I was shaken out of my sleep by someone.
zh: 突然，我被人摇醒了。

en: All at once we heard a shot.
zh: 突然，我们听到一声枪响。

en: Suddenly, the thick clouds hid the sun.
zh: 突然，厚厚的云层遮住了太阳。

en: All of a sudden, a dog began barking.
zh: 突然，一只狗开始吠叫。

en: Suddenly a bear appeared before us.
zh: 突然，一只熊出现在我们面前。

en: There was a sudden change of plan.
zh: 计划突然改变了。

en: All of a sudden the sky became dark.
zh: 突然，天空变得昏暗。

en: All at once the sky became dark and it started to rain.
zh: 突然，天空变得昏暗，开始下雨了。

en: It has suddenly got cold, hasn't it?
zh: 突然变冷了，不是吗？

en: It has suddenly gotten cold, hasn't it?
zh: 突然变冷了，不是吗？

en: Suddenly, a terrible storm came up.
zh: 突然，一场可怕的风暴来了。

en: All at once we heard a shot outside.
zh: 突然，我们听到外面一声枪响。

en: All of a sudden, the fire alarm went off.
zh: 突然，火警警报响了。

en: A sudden noise abstracted their attention from the game.
zh: 突然的噪音使他们从游戏中分心。

en: All at once, I heard a shrill cry.
zh: 突然，我听到一声尖叫。

en: Suddenly, it began to rain.
zh: 突然，开始下雨了。

en: Suddenly, it started to rain.
zh: 突然，开始下雨了。

en: All of a sudden, it began raining.
zh: 突然，开始下雨了。

en: All of a sudden it started raining.
zh: 突然，开始下雨了。
